channel.title: Posts on K. Dorheim Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on K. Dorheim Blog

item.title: Removing Cpp files Xcode
item.description: I was trying to remove an outdated cpp file from Hector and was runninng into issues. Compiling the new build in Xcode resulted in an error but in R the Cpp file complied without error. It turns out the problem is on the Xcode side of things see here for more details. To get Hector to build in Xcode without the source file I had to update the Xcode build phases.

item.title: Using symlink to change R versions
item.description: Switching between R versions on macOS can be difficult and annoying. One way to deal with multiple versions of R is via the command line. Start by taking a look at what is available on your local machine. cd /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions ls -l drwxrwxr-x 6 root admin 192 Jan 17 2019 3.2 drwxrwxr-x 6 root admin 192 Jan 18 2019 3.3 drwxrwxr-x 3 root admin 96 Mar 18 2020 3.5 drwxrwxr-x 6 root admin 192 Mar 18 2020 3.
